thread.title: Watch: Ladies’ Code Performs An Emotional Song Of Hope On “Immortal Songs”
thread.title_full: Watch: Ladies’ Code Performs An Emotional Song Of Hope On “Immortal Songs”

author: boxclub
title: Watch: Ladies’ Code Performs An Emotional Song Of Hope On “Immortal Songs”
text:
Shares 119   
The January 7 episode of the KBS 2TV show “Immortal Songs” saw the talented group Ladies’ Code sing a powerful tribute to hope as they entered the new year. 
Ladies’ Code chose to sing “Butterfly” by Loveholic, a song released in 2009 on the OST of the hit movie “Take Off.” Before their performance, in their interview with the producer, the group said that they wanted to sing the song to their members, RiSe and EunB, who passed away in a car accident on 2014. They said that they will carry on the dreams of their members and they did just that with their emotional performance. 
After their performance, Ladies’ Code could not hold back their tears as they thanked the fans who had been waiting for them all along. The panel cast members did not hold back on their praise for the group, saying that it felt like they were flying alongside them. 
Check out their performance on Viki here below!
